name: BLAM BLAM PLANET
description:
BLAM BLAM PLANET is an endless FPS originally created for Ludum Dare within 3 days. The theme of the jam was 10 Seconds. You (and your comrades) shoot lot of evil aliens on a planet, but every 10 seconds your weapon switches randomly - hilarity ensues!

BLAM BLAM PLANET version 1.3 is an improvement in a lot of details, so either play alone or take up to 3 friends with you. (XBox controllers are supported.)

If you want to try the game, there's an older version on the official web page for free!

BLAM BLAM PLANET 1.3 features hand-drawn textures and all-vocal sound effects. Includes music by Roald Strauss and Robson Cozendey.
